payload.llm_output:
- Ensure the matching algorithm can handle a variety of inputs, including abbreviations, misspellings, and informal names.
- Consider using a large, comprehensive database of registered companies to increase the likelihood of a successful match.
- Implement a confidence scoring system to determine when a match is above the 90% confidence threshold.
- Consider using machine learning techniques to improve the accuracy of matches over time.
- Ensure the system can handle a high volume of queries quickly and efficiently.
- Consider implementing a system to handle and learn from incorrect matches.
- Ensure the system is robust and can handle a variety of edge cases.
- Consider implementing a feedback loop to continuously improve the system based on user feedback and performance metrics.
